memberdef.argsstring: (const std::vector< uint256 > &leaves, uint32_t leaf_pos, std::vector< uint256 > &path)
memberdef.name: MerkleComputation

detaileddescription.para: Compute merkle path to the specified transaction

parameterdescription.para: transaction for which to calculate the merkle path (0 is the coinbase)

simplesect.para: merkle path ordered from the deepest
